name: BLAZOR.ART
about: BLAZOR.ART is a platform to spread awareness, bring Blazor developers together, provide resources and tools to developers to enhance their Blazor skills and to the enterprises to employ Blazor developers with ease and less turnaround time.

name: Online Test
about: an app that gives you free access to test your knowledge in GK, Technology, Mathematics, etc.

name: 1-800.BIZ
about: 1-800.BIZ is a platform that offers organizations to create a digital identity that can help connect with clients effortlessly and constantly.

name: Money IN/OUT
about: It is a simple personal money tracking app for all your money inflows and outflows.
